SEARCH

Package cdx.opencdx.media.service

package cdx.opencdx.media.service
This is the Service Interface package, designed specifically for defining Spring service interfaces.

The files housed within this package are typically of the Interface type. The corresponding implementations of these interfaces are located in the adjoining 'impl' package.

Since:
1.0
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    cdx.opencdx.media
    The OpenCDX Media microservice is a component responsible for file storage in OpenCDX.
    cdx.opencdx.media.service.impl
    This package is dedicated to the concrete implementation of Spring Service Interfaces.
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    OpenCDXFileStorageService
    Interface to implement File Storage Solutions.
    OpenCDXMediaService
    Interface for the OpenCDXMediaService, for processing files.
